author: hgc-tpg
body:
#### PR description:
- First round for the migration to an updated code structure. 
- This new code structure is developed in order to seamlessly run standalone emulator classes (bit-level emulation of the HGCAL TPG firmware, without any CMSSW dependencies) inside CMSSW.
- Details of this new code structure can be found in this presentation: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1061177/#29-emulator-technical-developm
- At the moment, both the old and new class structures are living together, with the old classes still being used as default
- As this is just the beginning of a large refactoring of our codebase, this will be continued with other PRs in the future
